title: Bug 121323: XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
OB: When entering an XPath expression for the column mapping in the XML Edit Data Set dialog, the selection part of the expression, such as section[@id='left'], is stripped off and stored in the filterInfo HashMap. However, when leaving the dialog, the RelationInformation is persisted to .rptdesign, but the data stored in filterInfo is lost. This can lead to trouble as XPath expressions should be preserved.
